about_the_game:
Space Gold Rush is a unique hybrid of tower-defense and real-time-strategy. Set in the not distant future where space travel has become viable to everyone. In the frontiers of space where there is the unexplored, also means there is untapped resources. No time to waste mining and extracting, and no regulators to setup health and safety laws and procedures, risk it all and join the many other prospectors in a new hazardous industry blowing up asteroids anyway they can in order to strike it rich.

7 Different Towers each with their own upgrade options to specialize their stats (damage, fire rate, and range).

Mobile Turrets able to set up any where and reposition to fit different roles or when plan A does not go well.
detailed_description:
Space Gold Rush is a unique hybrid of tower-defense and real-time-strategy. Set in the not distant future where space travel has become viable to everyone. In the frontiers of space where there is the unexplored, also means there is untapped resources. No time to waste mining and extracting, and no regulators to setup health and safety laws and procedures, risk it all and join the many other prospectors in a new hazardous industry blowing up asteroids anyway they can in order to strike it rich.

7 Different Towers each with their own upgrade options to specialize their stats (damage, fire rate, and range).

Mobile Turrets able to set up any where and reposition to fit different roles or when plan A does not go well.
name: Space gold rush TD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Dual Core (Intel i3-530 / AMD Athlon II X3 460)
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Join in on the next gold rush and become a prospector in space. In this unique tower defense you can set up and reposition towers for maximum efficiency and adapt to the environment.
